text.section:
This subtitle does not apply to:
Any bank, trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association, or credit union incorporated or chartered under the laws of this State or the United States that maintains its principal office in this State;
Any out-of-state bank, as defined in § 5-1001 of this article, having a branch that accepts deposits in this State; and
Any institution incorporated under federal law as a savings association or savings bank that does not maintain its principal office in this State but has a branch that accepts deposits in this State.

A subsidiary or affiliate of an institution described in subsection (a) of this section is exempt from all requirements of licensing under this subtitle provided the subsidiary or affiliate:
Is subject to audit or examination by a regulatory body or agency of this State, the United States, or the state where the subsidiary or affiliate maintains its principal office; and
Submits to the Commissioner in writing and prior to providing check cashing services the following information:
The subsidiary's or affiliate's name and address, and the names and addresses of each:
Any other information that the Commissioner requests.

section.section: An exempt entity is not subject to the provisions of §§ 12-106 through 12-112, inclusive, and § 12-122 of this subtitle.

An exempt entity is subject to:
The provisions of §§ 12-113 through 12-121, inclusive, and §§ 12-123 through 12-127, inclusive, of this subtitle; and
Any regulation, except to the extent the regulation concerns licensing, adopted under this subtitle.
